document_data.mainbody:
Sundice was a small settlement found in Sossal in the Cold Lands of northeast Faer√ªn during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Sundice was located in central Sossal in the shadow of Mount Sundabar, which lay to the southeast. Sundice was connected to Naupau in the east and Dharvil in the west by an unnamed road.
